Topic.Title: What in the *bleep* is erasing my screen?

Posts.EditableText: Either in the game-window or in QDK Editor, sometimes (happened like 3 times), the center of the screen will blank out.  Meaning in the game-window, the scroll bar is cut in half and no longer can I use it.  In QDK Editor, whatever falls within the erase-zone no longer shows or can be used, and then it progressively gets worse.  Just me?
